metadata.title: CVE-2018-14774 on Ubuntu 21.04 (hirsute) - medium.
metadata.description: An issue was discovered in HttpKernel in Symfony 2.7.0 through 2.7.48, 2.8.0 through 2.8.43, 3.3.0 through 3.3.17, 3.4.0 through 3.4.13, 4.0.0 through 4.0.13, and 4.1.0 through 4.1.2. When using HttpCache, the values of the X-Forwarded-Host headers are implicitly set as trusted while this should be forbidden, leading to potential host header injection.

criterions.comment: symfony package in hirsute, is related to the CVE in some way and has been fixed (note: '3.4.15+dfsg-2ubuntu4').
